However, just a month back, he had to pay tuition fees and living arrangements for his children, and that made him lack the money at the moment to buy some spare parts for his bus. This is why Uran is requesting a KIVA loan via VisionFund Albania for the first time.  He is grateful to KIVA for the opportunity he has been granted, because this loan will be a great help to him.

loans.use: buy spare parts for his bus

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, el cual necesita para invertir en la compra de materiales para la pupuseria, comprándose chicharrón, quesillo, condimentos, bebidas, estos otros productos que intervienen en la  producción y venta de las pupusas.
Con el préstamo anterior logro fortalecer el negocio, manteniendo lo necesario para la elaboración de pupusas, que hasta la fecha ha podido mantener esta situación.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan, which she needs to invest in buying materials for her tortilla stand: pork rind, soft cheese, condiments and drinks. Other products which are involved in the productions and sale of tortillas.

With the previous loan she succeeded in strengthening her business and maintaining the required items for making tortillas that until now she had been able to maintain the situation.

loans.use: to buy pork rind, soft cheese, condiments and drinks.

loans.name: Victor Antonio

texts.es:
Víctor está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, pues se encuentra en la temporada donde se inicia el trabajo en la tierra, el deberá comprarse de fertilizantes, pago de trabajadores, abono y semilla, considera que con este nuevo préstamo tendrá la oportunidad de realizar una buena siembra.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue la realización de la compra de los insumos agrícolas que utilizó en la cosecha pasada, la cual le trajo una buena producción de maíz con la que se ha mantenido con su familia.
texts.en: Víctor is seeking a new loan to buy agricultural supplies as the growing season is just starting. He will need to buy fertilizer, hire laborers, buy manure and seeds. Victor believes that this new loan will give him the opportunity to get a good crop. With his previous loan he bought agricultural supplies for the last growing season which resulted in a good maize harvest and enabled him to provide support for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and seeds, and to hire laborers

loans.name: La Richesse 2 (#3) Group

texts.en:
Jean, age 40, is married and has a 12-year-old child. He also cares for his father in his home.  Jean is representing the La Richesse 2 #3 group. 

Jean owns a drink store and has had this business for 2 years. He will use the loan to restock his store with local and imported drinks. His business strategy is to keep his store clean and organized. He wants to keep the atmosphere in his store pleasing for the customers.
 
Jean has received 3 previous loans from Kiva’s partner, HOPE Congo. He has a good repayment record. In the future, he wants to expand his business and products by buying a soft-serve ice cream machine and an ice machine. He wants to continue to grow his business because it is helping him to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: buy softdrinks to resell

loans.name: Lela

texts.en:
Lela is 37 years old. She lives in a small village in Lanchkhuti District with her husband, Zurab, her mother-in-law, who is a pensioner, and her two children (12 and 17 years old). Both of the children study in the village school. Lela is busy with her dairy farm. She has three milking cows and four calves. She produces dairy food like cheese, curds and yogurt, and sells it in the local open market. In addition, Lela and Zurab are busy with farming. They have a plot of land where maize and 400 nut trees are grown. Lela and Zurab work hard during spring and summer seasons to get a good harvest. They sell the harvested products in the local open market. According to government estimates, the family belongs to the vulnerable poor category and they get monthly social assistance in the amount of 125 Laris. The total average monthly income of the family is 500 Laris. 

Lela requested a loan to cultivate her agricultural land . After cultivation, she will sow the maize. Lela and Zurab will work hard. After the seasonal work is properly done, they hope to get a larger harvest. This will increase their sales of corn. With the increased income, she will be able to reinvest in the family agricultural business and purchase additional household goods to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to cultivate land

loans.name: Ruth Magaly

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC II” ,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas,colonias,perfumes entre otros,la socia a la vez se dedica  a la compra  y venta de ropa,la socia vende su mercaderia de forma ambulatoria a todos sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de ropa como casacas y chompas.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Ruth is a member of communal banl IMASUMAC II. She continues with her business of selling beauty products such as creams, perfumes, colognes, and others. She also trades in clothing: she buys clothes that she sells door-to-door to all the customers who ask for her products. Ruth is a cheerful and responsible person who wants above all to keep going for the sake of her family. She asks for this loan to buy clothes such as jackets and jumpers. She is grateful for this loan and she promises to honour her repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Maia

texts.en:
Maia is 26 years old and lives in the village of Kobuleti District. She is married and lives with her husband, Nugzar, and her two children (3 and 5 years old). Both of them go to kindergarten. Nugzar is a policeman and gets a salary. Maia is involved in agricultural activities. She has a milking cow and a calf. She sells milk in nearby villages. In addition, she owns a plot of land, where corn, nuts, mandarins are grown. She takes the harvested fruits and vegetables to the local open market to sell. The total average monthly income of the family is 800 Laris.

Maia requested a loan to purchase agricultural land. She will sow more fruits and vegetables there and increase her harvest. This will increase the income of the family. With an increased income, she will be able to reinvest in the family agricultural business. Due to the above-mentioned, living conditions of the family will improve.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural land

loans.name: Jonatan Enrique

texts.es:
Jonatán, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, pues considera que es necesario un nuevo reforzamiento al negocio, comprándose mas medicamentos para mantener surtido el negocio, se comprara vitaminas, pastillas y productos medicinales, con los que espera tener más aceptación de sus clientes.
Con el préstamo anterior logro mejorar la disponibilidad en el negocio, aumentando el inventario y con la oportunidad de generar mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Jonatán is seeking a new loan as he believes his business needs new stock. He plans to buy more merchandise such as vitamins, tablets, and medicinal products and increase his customer base.

With his previous loan, Jonatán succeeded in improving his business and generating more income.

loans.use: To buy vitamins, tablets, and medicinal products

loans.name: Nazi

texts.en:
Nazi is 48 years old. She is married and lives in a small village in the Tkibuli District with her husband, Jumber, her 25-year-old son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren (2 and 3 years old). Her husband and son are construction workers. Nazi does agricultural activities. She has four milking cows and three calves and produces cheese every day. Part of the cheese is used by the family and the other part is sold in the local open market. She also has 600 nut trees. She picks nuts in the late summer and sells it in nearby villages. The total average monthly income of the family is 800 Laris.

Nazi requested a loan to purchase a milk cow. She will be able to produce and sell more dairy products such as cheese, curds and yogurt.  Thus, she plans to expand her business in order to earn a good profit. With increased profits, she will be able to reinvest in her family's agricultural business, as well as spend more on the family's daily needs and the living conditions of the family will be improved.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Karen

texts.en: Karen is married and lives with her husband and two children. She started her food-selling business two years ago. She cooks her own food and sells at retail to her neighbors and passersby. Her food is delicious and her kitchen is surprisingly clean. Her customers' satisfaction is good. However, the raw materials are getting too expensive. Therefore, she's requesting KES 50,000 to purchase meat from local herders, bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and rice, which will save her money. She will use half of the meat for her food business. She's a sharp and hardworking woman who says, "If I couldn't get my raw materials cheap, I could lose my business."

loans.use: to purchase meat, wheat flour, maize flour and rice

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC II”, la socia se sigue dedicando a la elaboracion de jugos ,ella vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco desde las 07:00am hasta las 05:00pm aproximadamente,la socia lleva buen tiempo en su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona empeñosa con mucha ganas de continuar trabajando.

La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio como platanos,naranjas y papaya.


La socia se siente agradecida por le prestamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member is part of the Communal Bank "Imasumac II". She continues with her business of making juices. She sells her products at one of the markets in the city of Cusco approximately between the hours of 7am and 5pm. The member has a good time working and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her business each day. She is an industrious person who has the desire to continue working. Therefore, she is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies for her business such as bananas, oranges, and papayas.

The member is grateful for the loan that has been provided and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to purchase bananas, oranges, and papayas.

loans.name: Mwanauru

texts.en: Mwanauru is married and lives with her husband and five children. Her husband helps with her business. She started her food-selling business four years ago by renting a shop in the market. Since she started the business, she has expanded her shop and gained many regular customers. She anticipates an increase in demand for her products and she plans to increase her supplies in order to meet the market demand. In the future, she plans to build her own house. She is a sharp and hardworking woman who says, "Since my business is the only income in the family, I need to make the best of it". She is requesting 40,000 KES to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and rice..

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, maize flour and rice.

loans.name: Ignasia

texts.es:
Ignacia, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en materiales para la siembra de maíz y también en la compra de productos para la tienda, los materiales a invertir en la siembra son el abono, herbicidas, semilla y la preparación de la tierra para la tienda se comprará aceite, condimentos, embutidos, boquitas, gaseosas.
Ella comenta que con el préstamo anterior tuvo un efecto positivo ya que logró surtirle tienda y mantener un buen nivel de inventario, esto le ha ayudado a mejorar también la producción en el maíz, porque realizo la siembra de la que recibió una cosecha anteriormente.
texts.en:
Ignasia is asking for a new loan to invest in materials for planting corn and also for purchasing products for her store.  The materials for investing in the corn-field are fertilizer, weed-killer, seed, and the preparation of the land.  For the store she will buy oil, condiments, sausages, snacks, and sodas.  

She says that the previous loan had a positive effect because she managed to stock up her store and to maintain a good level of inventory.  This helped her to also improve the production of corn, because it allowed for the crop that produced the previous harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, weed-killer, seeds, oil, condiments, sausages, and snacks.

loans.name: Bintiomar

texts.en: Bintiomar is married with one child who attends school. Her husband is a hotelier and he contributes to the family's basic needs with his earnings. She started her food stall business a year ago. Her shop location is good and her food stall is well known around the neighborhood for her nice service and quality food. Ever since she opened her shop, her business has been expanding steadily. Many buildings have been built around the neighborhood; therefore, her market demand is increasing. She is requesting 20,000 KES to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and beans.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and beans.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de elaboracion y venta de chicha y frutillada,ella tiene una picanteria donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negcoio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de picanteria y venta de chicha y elaboracion de frutilla.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos para preparar chicha y frutillada como maiz,azucar y levadura.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gregoria is still making and selling chicha (a corn-based drink) and fruit smoothies. She runs a snack bar where she works from 8am to 5pm. She hopes her business will help her progress in life; her dream is to grow and improve the business. Gregoria is seeking a loan to buy ingredients for the drinks such as sugar and yeast.

She is happy to have the opportunity to get a loan and promises to make the repayments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make chicha and fruit drinks

loans.name: Yeny

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMASUMAC II”,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de cds ,la socia vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco,ella trabaja en su negocio todos los dias desde las 08:00am hasta las 05:00pm aproximadamente,la socia a la vez es enfermera de profesion ,la socia es una persona carismatica y responsable siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mas cds.

La socia se siente agradecida por el prestamo otorgado y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Yeny belongs to the “IMASUMAC II” Communal Bank. She continues with her business selling CDs. She sells in one of the markets in the city of Cusco and works in her business every day from 8 a.m. until approximately 5 p.m. 

Yeny is a nurse by profession.  She is a charismatic and responsible person. This is the way she is moving her family forward.

She is requesting the loan to buy more CDs. She is grateful for the loan provided and promises to make all of her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase more CDs.

loans.name: Tsaghik

texts.en:
Tsaghik started her own business 15 years ago. She is involved in the food trading business at her own small stall. In the summer months, many tourists who go to the Sevan lakes from Yerevan visit Tsaghik’s shop. In the summer season, Tsaghik sells at her stall not only food, but also swimsuits, towels, ring buoys, etc. which are popular and in demand.
   
At the same time, Tsaghik is engaged in an agricultural activity. She breeds some cows and a pig. The agricultural products Tsaghik uses for her family. Tsaghik is 53 years old and a widow. She lives in Tsovagyugh village in the Sevan region with her daughter-in-law. Tsaghik’s son lives and works in Russia at the moment. Her daughter-in-law helps Tsaghik in her occupation and thus they provide for their family. Tsaghik is a cook and for many years, she worked at recreation area restaurants as a cook.
  
Tsaghik is asking for a 500.000 AMD loan to buy swimsuits, towels, ring-buoys and other beach accessories to resell.

loans.use: to buy swimsuits, towels, ring-buoys and other beach accessories to re-sell

loans.name: Yenny

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende produtos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche,galletas y aceite,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y galletas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Yenny is continuing to run her grocery business.  She sells everyday staples such as rice, sugar, milk, cookies and oil.  This business has allowed her to provide a better life for her children. Her dream is to expand and improve her store.  She is seeking this loan so she can buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies at wholesale prices.  She is grateful for this opportunity and promises to complete her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies in bulk.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
LA SEÑORA VERONICA L. MADRE DE DOS ESTUDIANTES Y EMPRENDEDORES HIJOS ES UNA MADRE EJEMPLAR Y TRABAJADORA QUE VE SIEMPRE POR EL BIEN ESTAR DE SU HOGAR Y SU FAMILIA. 
EN ESTOS DIAS  VERONICA ESTA PREOCUPADA POR UNAS CUARTADURAS QUE HAI EN UNA DE LAS PAREDES DE SU HOGAR Y TEME QUE LLEGUE A PASAR A PEORES CIRCUNSTANCIAS Y SE VEA DAÑADA LA INTEGRIDAD DE SU FAMILIA Y SU PATRIMONIO.
SOLICITA EL CREDITO PARA RECONSTRUIR LA PARED Y NO TENER LA PREOCUPACION DE QUE UN DIA LLEGEUE A PASAR ALGO QUE SE LAMENTE Y QUE SE PUDO ARREGLAR A TIEMPO.
texts.en:
Sra. Veronica L. is the mother of two enterprising children who are students. She is an exemplary and hardworking mother who always tries to provide for the well-being of her household and her family. Lately Veronica has been concerned about some cracks in one of the walls of her home that resulted from some unfortunate circumstances. This has damaged the integrity of her home and impacted her family.

She is requesting a loan in order to rebuild the wall so that she can stop worrying about something bad that could happen that could result in more repairs.

loans.use: to repair a damaged wall in her home.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 31 years old, married and has four children who are 12, 10, 8 and 4 years old. She runs a retail shop and has one employee. She has been in the business for two years.

She hopes to buy a pick-up for easy transportation of her goods. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has known how to manage her business well because she has been trained on business management. She needs a loan of 40,000 KES to buy cooking oil, maize flour, salt and sugar for her business.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, maize flour, salt and sugar

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo porque necesita reparar y darle mantenimiento a las condiciones de su automóvil, este préstamo le ayudará a contratar un buen mecánico y a comprarse los repuestos necesarios para poder seguir circulando como taxista, el considera que esta es una necesidad para que él pueda continuar trabajando por su familia.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue muy positivo, ya que ha logrado ir mejorando las condiciones del vehículo y brindar un mejor servicio a los clientes dándole más condiciones de comodidad a la hora de trasladarlos.
texts.en:
Carlos is requesting a new loan because he needs to repair and maintain the condition of his automobile. This loan will help him to hire a good mechanic and to buy the necessary parts to keep his taxi in operation. He considers this to be a necessity because he has to continue working in order to support his family.

The effect of his previous loan was very positive. Carlos was able to improve the conditions of his vehicle and provide better service to his customers, who have experienced more comfortable conditions while traveling.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio de ropa, su intención es tener más variedad  para ponerla a la venta comprando se blusas, ropa interior, vestidos, ropa de caballero, esperando que sean aceptados por sus clientes y poder ofrecer un buen precio para aumentar las ventas.
El préstamo anterior le ayudó a realizar una buena inversión de la cual hasta el momento se ha podido sostener y ayudar a su familia, actualmente el también está realizando viajes como taxista que es un ingreso adicional para su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is applying for a new loan to invest in his clothing business. His intention is to have a greater variety to put on sale by buying blouses, underwear, dresses and menswear in the hope that they will be accepted by his customers. He aims to sell at a good price in order to increase sales.

The previous loan helped him make a good investment, which enabled him to support and help his family up to now. Currently he is also working as a taxi drive to earn additional income for his family.

loans.use: to buy blouses, underwear, dresses and menswear.

loans.name: Manuela De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuela, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poderlo invertir en el negocio y poder brindar como siempre una buena atención a sus clientes, ella se comprara medicamentos naturales como jengibre, linaza, orégano, entre otras especies secas que son buenas para cualquier enfermedad.
Ella manifiesta haber tenido una buena experiencia con el préstamo anterior ayudó a tener una variedad de hierbas y de medicamentos que en su momento le sirvieron para atender las necesidades de los clientes, sus circunstancias familiares están cambiando a través de la utilización de los préstamos.
texts.en:
Manuela is requesting a new loan to invest in her business so that she can continue providing her customers with a good service.  She will buy natural medicines such as ginger, linseed, oregano and other dried herbs which are good for treating all sorts of illnesses.

Manuela says that her previous loan was very useful.  It helped her to have a variety of herbs and medicines in stock.  This enabled her to meet her customers' needs.  Her family circumstances are changing as a result of these loans.

loans.use: to buy ginger, linseed and oregano

loans.name: Jesica Loraine

texts.es: Jesica es una joven soltera de 23 años de edad que comercializa desde hace dos años cosméticos, accesorios, perfumes, mercancía en general, minutos a celular y recargas telefónicas.  Con su primer credikiva pretende invertir en la compra al por mayor de esta mercancía para la venta y capitalizarse para el negocio de las recargas y minutos, confía en que la inversión será exitosa porque posee un gran número de clientes y su local esta ubicado estratégicamente en el barrio Siete de Abril, donde transitan muchas personas. Jesica terminó su bachillerato a los 18 años e inicia inmediatamente sus estudios técnicos de almacén y bodegaje, termina esperanzada en que conseguirá empleo rápidamente, pero no fue así.  Sus padres al ver que quería trabajar y generar ingresos, le entregan un capital inicial de $300,000.00 COP para que montara su propio negocio de mercancías y venta de minutos.  La mercancía la vende a crédito, otorgando plazos para gagos quincenales, los minutos y recargas son de contado y su rentabilidad se genera por el volumen de venta.  Cuenta con la colaboración de su familia en la atención del negocio y siempre la han impulsado a seguir adelante.  Jesica sueña con tener una casa propia, realizarse más adelante como mujer y tener un carro que le permita abarcas otras zonas de trabajo.
texts.en:
Jesica is a young, single woman aged 23. For two years she has sold cosmetics, accessories, perfumes, general items, cellphone minutes and cellphone top-ups. She plans to use her first Kiva loan to buy these wholesale items and sell them, and to obtain capital for her top-up and cellphone minutes business. 
 
She is sure that her investment will be a success, as she has a large number of customers and her premises are strategically located in the Siete de Abril neighborhood, which is frequented by many people.

Jesica finished high school at 18 years of age, and immediately began her technical studies into warehouse and general store management. She thought she would get a job quickly, but sadly this was not the case. When her parents saw that she wanted to work and earn money, they gave her an initial capital of $300,000.00 COP so she could set up her own business selling goods and cellphone minutes. She sells her goods on credit, organizing installment payments every two weeks. Cellphone minutes and top-ups are paid in cash, and her profitability comes from the sales volumes she achieves. 

Jesica has the collaboration of her family in running the business, and they have always encouraged her to get ahead. She dreams of having her own home, getting married and starting a family, and having a car which will allow her to work in other areas.

loans.use: To buy perfumes, cosmetics and accessories for sale, and to obtain more capital for cellphone top-ups and the sale of cellphone minutes.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de panaderia,la socia realiza panes de diferente tipos,ella elabora tambien los panes y pasteles,la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de panaderia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos para preparar pan como harina,mantequilla,azucar y levadura.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Teresa is continuing to operate her baking business.  She makes different types of breads an also makes cookies.  She works from 6:00 am to 7:00 pm.  Through this business she has been able to provide a better life for her children.  Her dream is to expand her baking business.

She is seeking this loan in order to buy ingredients for making bread, such as flour, butter, sugar and yeast.  She is grateful for this opportunity and promises to repay her loan on schedule.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making bread, such as flour, butter, sugar and yeast.

loans.name: Maria Elva

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo pues considera tener la necesidad para poder fortalecer nuevamente el negocio comprándose maíz para las tortillas y queso, crema, para salir a revender, ella manifiesta que a través de estos préstamos está creciendo en el mercado.
Con el préstamo anterior logró también invertir en el negocio obteniendo buenos resultados que hasta el momento le han ayudado a estabilizar su situación económica con su familia.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan since she needs to again strengthen her business by buying corn for tortillas as well as cheese and cream, which she will go out to resell. She states that through these loans she is growing in the market.

With the previous loan she was also successful investing in her business and obtained good results that until now have helped her stabilize the economic situation of her family.

loans.use: to purchase corn, cheese and cream.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es:
Mario, Está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, para poderlo invertir en mercadería y así aumentar su negocio, se comprará boquitas, pan, aceite, azúcar, arroz, dulces, y otros más que son necesarios y demandados por los clientes, este préstamo será una gran ayuda para continuar en el fortalecimiento de la tienda.
El efecto que tuvo con su préstamo anterior fue positivo ya que le ayudó a mantener un negocio surtido y poder atender las necesidades de los clientes, aumentó sus ganancias y al mismo tiempo ha mejorado su situación económica familiar.
texts.en: Mario is seeking a new loan to invest in merchandise so she can expand her business.  She will buy snacks, bread, rice, oil, sugar and sweets and other necessary items that are in demand by her customers.  This loan will be of great help in allowing her to continue to fortify her shop.  The previous loan had a very positive effect as it helped her to keep her store supplied so that she could attend to the needs of her customers.  She has been able to increase her earnings and at the same time has been able to improve her family's economic situation.

loans.use: to buy snacks, bread, rice, oil, sugar and sweets.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”IMASUMAC II”;la socia continua dedicandose a la agricultura,ella siembra lo que son papa y maiz,a la vez la socia tambien continua dedicandose a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas,la socia lleva años ejerciendo sus negocios los cuales le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a cada uno de ellos,la socia es una persona responsable , siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para su chacra. 


La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the 'Imasumac II' community bank.  She continues working in agriculture, sowing potatoes and corn.  She also continues raising animals such as guinea pigs and hens.  She has been working in her businesses for years and things are going well thanks to the hard work that she puts in.  The member is a responsible person and this is how she provides for her family.

The member is requesting this loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farm.

The member is grateful for her loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her farm

loans.name: Ana Maribel

texts.es:
Ana, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poder surtir la tienda y al mismo tiempo comprarse ropa usada, entre las cosas que se comprará son boquitas, gaseosas, jugos, ropa como blusas y faldas además también invertirá en productos cosméticos de revistas.
Ella manifiesta que con el préstamo anterior realizó una buena inversión comprándose productos para el negocio, esto le ha servido para mantenerse hasta el momento con un buen nivel de ventas y poder proveer para su familia los ingresos necesarios cubriendo todas sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Ana is requesting a new loan so that she can stock her store and, at the same time, buy used clothing.  She will buy snacks, soda, juice and clothing such as blouses and skirts.  She will also invest in buying catalog cosmetics.

Ana says that she was able to use her previous loan to make a good investment, buying products for her business.  This helped her to maintain her business with a good level of sales.  She has been able to provide for her family and make the income she needs to cover all their needs.

loans.use: to buy snacks, soda, juice and clothing such as blouses and skirts

loans.name: Kurt

texts.en:
Some know Kurt as the fastest foot messenger in New York City. But, Kurt is also a writer who self-publishes novels, poetry and non-fiction inspired by his 15+ years of experience as a messenger. He has published five works thus far. He says, "My business is 100% a passion of mine! Ever since I was young I have been writing. After years being a bike messenger and getting to know every part of this city. I realized I had stories that other people would like to hear." 

In 2009, Kurt was featured in the NYTimes. He was quoted saying, "I’ve been to so many bodegas and stores all over the city, traveled so many train lines, seen so many different communities and people and it hit me: This American Dream thing is real. People actually come as far away as India or China and start a business and actually work to believe in this thing. I took it for granted, but now I believe it. I actually experienced it." 

Kurt has had the opportunity to collaborate with many great artists, photographers, writers, filmmakers and other bikers on his books and messenger bag designs. He will used this loan to print more copies of his most popular books – Asphalt Warrior & New York Alleycat - and attend upcoming festivals where he plans to sell them. In the future he would like to enhance e-commerce functions on his website to sell more books directly to customers. 

You can check out the article here: http://www.nytimes.com/2009/04/05/nyregion/thecity/05mess.html?_r=1
Also see Kurt's website: http://www.kurtboonebooks.com/

loans.use: to print copies of his books to sell

loans.name: La Richesse 2 (#4) Group

texts.en:
Obed, age 37, is single and has a 3-year-old child. He also provides for and cares for his father. Obed is representing the La Richesse 2 #4 group. He owns a small grocery shop in Brazzaville. He has had this business for over 15 years! He has a strong presence in his community and has acquired many customers over the years. He will use the loan to buy merchandise to restock his grocery shop. His business strategy is to offer good prices and be willing to barter with customers to find the best price. 

Obed has received three previous loans from Kiva’s partner, HOPE Congo. He hopes to continued to expand his business and become a large business owner one day.

loans.use: to pay for food and other inventory items for his shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, soap, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of rice to sell

loans.name: Lenie

texts.en:
For over five years in Magsaysay, Baliangao, Misamis Occidental, Lenie, a 56-year-old widowed mother of two children, has made a living through the operation of a general store selling a variety of food and home-use products. She earns 5,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Lenie joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, soaps, etc. She plans to save the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, Milo (breakfast drink powder), shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Rosibel

texts.es: Rosibel de 47 años de edad de la aldea barrio el pueblito casada  con dos hijos  tiene por actividad la venta de refrescos naturales desde hace tres años  ubicada en su casa de habitación,  el financiamiento lo quiere para  la compra de frutas para la elaboración de sus refrescos como: papaya, sandia, cálala, melón, bananos, naranjas, piña, azúcar, entre otros.
texts.en: Rosibel is 47 years old and lives in El Pueblito.  She is married and has two children.  Her business is selling natural soft drinks.  She has been in this business for three years and it is located in her home.  She would like this loan to buy fruit with which to make her soft drinks.  She will buy papaya, watermelon, passion fruit, melon, bananas, oranges, pineapple, sugar, etc.

loans.use: to buy fruit for making soft drinks

loans.name: Yaneht

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de elaboracion y venta de artesania,la socia hace trabajos de artesania como aretes y collares ,la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesania.La socia solicita el credito para comprar materiales como almabres,pegamentos y piedras de colores.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues to make a living through a business of making and selling handicrafts.  She makes crafts like earrings and necklaces, and works from 9:00 a.m. until 5 p.m.  By means of this business she can get her children ahead in life.  Her dream is to increase and improve her business of selling handicrafts.  She asks for the loan in order to buy materials like wires, glue, and colored stones.  She is happy for the loan and promises to complete her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy materials like wires, glue, and colored stones.

loans.name: Nelly Esther

texts.es: Nelly es una mujer de 53 años, casada y con dos hijos que vive en el barrio Las Nieves donde comercializa artículos de ferretería como tornillos, repuestos, alambres, elementos de  electricidad, tubos, herrería, entre otros.  Algunas veces carece de capital disponible para comprar mayor surtido, es por esto que solicita su primer credikiva  que le permita invertir en la compra de nuevos productos para la ferretería y repuestos principalmente de ollas a presión y abanicos.  Nelly inició esta actividad motivada por su esposo, quien al recibir un dinero que le debían producto de su pensión obligatoria, compró una vitrina que surtió de algunos artículos en la sala de su casa.  Poco a poco sus pedidos fueron creciendo al igual que sus clientes, hasta el momento le ha ido muy bien y ha tenido acogida entre los vecinos del barrio, por eso su sueño es hacer crecer cada vez más su negocio, tener una mayor estructura donde pueda ofrecer también artículos de miscelánea y variedades, con los que pueda incrementar su rentabilidad.  Nelly trabaja día a día para lograr su sueño, es una mujer trabajadora y dedicada a su familia.
texts.en: Nelly is 53 years old.  She is married and has two children with whom she lives in Las Nieves neighborhood.  This is where she sells hardware products such as screws, spare parts, wire, electric components, pipes, ironwork, etc.  Sometimes Nelly lacks capital with which to buy more stock.  She is requesting her first Kiva loan so that she can invest in buying new products for her hardware store and also spare parts (mainly for pressure cookers and fans).  Nelly started her business through her husband who received some money from his pension and bought a display case in which to stock some articles in their living room.  Gradually their orders grew, as did their customer base.  Up to now the business has done very well and has been popular with their neighbors.  Their dream is to further grow their business and to have better infrastructure so that they can also start to offer general store products and other miscellaneous goods.  This will help to increase their profits.  Nelly works every day in order to fulfill her dream.  She is a hard-working woman who is devoted to her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of hardware items and also spare parts for pressure cookers and fans

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, plant fertilizer, and weed-killer.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina, es casada, con dos hijos menores de 40 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general , forma de vida que le ha permito sacar adelante a sus hijos, y de ser independiente económicamente, en la actualidad luz marina ha demostrado ser responsable, trabajadora y con metas y sueños personales, como es termina de construir y hacer mejoras en su casa de habitación, para poder darles seguridad a sus hijos, el financiamiento lo quiere para comprar material de construcción como : zinc, arena, cemento bloques, ladrillos, madera, clavos, alfajillas, entre otros.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is married, and she has two children under the age of 40.

She sells general merchandise.  This way of life has allowed her to get her children ahead and to be financially independent.  Luz Marina has demonstrated herself to be responsible and hard working.  

She has goals and personal dreams like to finish building and making improvements to her house.  She will do this to be able to provide her children with security.

She wants to use the loan to buy construction materials like zinc sheeting, sand, cement blocks, bricks, wood, nails, and lumber, among others.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like zinc sheeting, sand, cement blocks, bricks, wood, nails, and lumber, among others.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Благодаря предыдущему кредиту у Александра увеличилась валовая выручка и чистая прибыль. Зимой Александр столкнулся с трудностью - из-за ухудшения погоды был период спада в его бизнесе. Александр успешно преодолел эту трудность и в весеннее время его бизнес вышел на прежний уровень продаж.

Александр просит предоставить ему кредит на развитие бизнеса. Он планирует закупить сезонный (летний) товар и увеличить оборот. За счет дополнительной прибыли Александр планирует улучшить свои жилищные условия - приобрести новую мебель.
texts.en:
Thanks to a previous loan, Alexander has increased his gross revenue and net income. Alexander had some difficulty in winter: because of bad weather, there was a downturn in his business. Alexander successfully overcame this difficulty, and in the spring his business's sales rebounded. 

Alexander is asking for a loan to develop his business. He plans to purchase seasonal (summer) goods to increase product sales. With any additional profit, Alexander plans to improve their living conditions by buying new furniture.

loans.use: purchase seasonal (summer) goods to increase product sales

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is married and has two children. 

Ailyn is selling ready-to-wear clothing like blouses and short pants as well as ladies accessories.  She has had this business for five years.  She has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy and stock ready-to-wear clothing and ladies accessories such as combs, face powder and hair clips.

Ailyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Ailyn hopes to improve her business and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy and stock clothing and ladies accessories.

loans.name: Artemisa

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 1 filho que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa dos seus pais com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, farinha, óleo, feijão, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro pretende construir um bar grande para conquistar novos clientes, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é de conquistar um espaço no comércio para obter mais confiança dos seus clientes.
texts.en:
Artemisa is single and the mother of 1 son who attends School. She lives in her parents' house with her family and doesn't support anyone.

She has a business selling food products and with this loan she intends to buy products (rice, flour, oil, beans and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she intends to build a large bar to conque new clients and to this end she commits to duly paying off this loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to obtain a commercial space to increase her clients' trust.

loans.use: buy products (rice, flour, oil, beans and others) to increase the quantity of her stock

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: La Sra. María  tiene 63 años y es divorciada con 2 hijos mayores que son de las edades de 35 y 28 años, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como abarrotes, fideo, arroz y azúcar, su tienda se encuentran ubicado en la zona Santos Dumont,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. María  va a usar este préstamo de para compra de abarrotes por mayor como fideo, arroz y azúcar y así de esta manera incrementar su capital de trabajo,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir ampliando su  negocio, la Sra.  María va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando mercadería y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener una amplia gama de productos de primera necesidad para ofrecer a su clientela.
texts.en: María is 63 years old and is divorced, with two adult children who are 28 and 35 years old.  She sells groceries such as noodles, rice and sugar.  Her shop is located in the area of Santos Dumont.  This is her first loan from this institution.  She will use the funds to buy items such as those mentioned above so she can expand her inventory.  Her reason for seeking this loan is so she can continue to grow her business.  She will use the loan proceeds to continue to buy merchandise and this be able to improve her income.  Her wish for her business is to have a wide array of products to be able to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy groceries such as noodles, rice and sugar.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 22-year-old single guy. He is a university student, majoring in Finance and Banking. 
Mohammad has applied for this loan to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Rasha

texts.en:
Rasha is a 26-year-old mother of two children. Her husband is working two jobs to be able to provide his family with a good living condition and environment.

As a help to her husband, and using her connections at beauty salons, Rasha started a small business selling electrical goods and equipment that are used in beauty salons. She has applied for this youth loan in order to add selling cosmetic products and makeup to salons.

loans.use: add selling cosmetic products and makeup to salons

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock such as canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy products (peanuts, flour, oil, beans and others) to increase the quantity of his stock.

loans.name: Henrik

texts.ru:
Более 20 лет Генрик занимается ремонтом и изготовлением обуви в городе Капане. У Генрика есть небольшое помещение, которое он использует как мастерскую для своего бизнеса. У него есть свои собственные станки, а сырье и обувные формы Генрик приобретает в Ереване. Сырье он закупает дважды в месяц. Генрик принимает заказы на ремонт обуви, а так же изготавливает обувь по частному заказу. Услугами мастерской Генрика пользуются многие жители города Капана. Генрик работает шесть дней в неделю до позднего вечера, в отличие от остальных мастерских по ремонту обуви. 
Генрику 55 лет и он родился в городе Капане. После окончания школы, Генрик поступил в строительный техникум. Генрик женат и у него двое детей: сын и дочь. Жена Генрика домохозяйка, дочь замужем и проживает отдельно от родителей, сын Генрика помогает отцу в мастерской. 
 Благодаря своему бизнесу Генрик содержит свою семью. Генрик получал кредит от организации Нор Оризон 3 раза и он всегда выплачивал кредит вовремя. Сейчас ему необходим кредит на сумму 800.000 драм для покупки подошв, кожи, клея, и другого необходимого сырья для своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
For more than twenty years, Henrik has worked repairing and manufacturing footwear in Kapan. Henrik has a small shop which he uses as a workshop for his business. He has his own tools and materials, and Henrik gets the shoe forms in Yerevan. He buys raw materials twice a month. Henrik takes orders for shoe repairs, and also makes shoes special order. Many residents of the city of Kapan use Henrik's services. Henrik works six days a week until late at night, unlike other shoe repair shops. 

Henrik is 55 years old, and he was born in the town of Kapan. After graduation, Henrik studied civil engineering. Henrik is married and has two children: a son and a daughter. Henrik's wife is a housewife, and his daughter is married and living on her own. Henrik's son helps his father in the workshop. Thanks to the business Henrik can support his family. Henrik has received loans from Nor Horizon three times, and he always paid on time. Now he needs a loan of 800,000 drams to buy soles, leather, glue, and other necessary materials for his business.

loans.use: To buy soles, leather, glue, and other necessary materials for his business

loans.name: Akbar

texts.ru: Akbar biznesmen s 30 letnim stajom. On derjit svoy produktoviy magazin. Segodna on obratilsa za dengami v 1600 AZN dla togo chtobi sdelat novie polki v magazine i kupit xolodilnik. Akbar jenat u nego dvoe detey vozrastov vosem i chetire. Osnovnaya ego cel' eto ne progoret v biznese, ego delo edinstvenniy doxod ego semyi i radi etogo on staraetsa s sovestyu.
texts.en: Akbar has been in business for thirty years. He has his own grocery shop. Now, he is asking for a loan of 1600 AZN to make new shelves in his shop and to buy a refrigerator. Akbar is married and has two children, ages seven and four. His primary goal is not to lose his business. His business is the only source of income for his family, and therefore he tries his hardest.

loans.use: To buy a fridge and to make shelves for his grocery shop.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
LA SEÑORA ESTELA TIENE UNA HIJA QUE DEPENDE DE ELLA Y DE SU ESPOSO, ELLA TRABAJA EN SU PROPIA TIENDA DE ABARROTES, DULCES, ENTRE OTROS.
ES UNA GANANCIA EXTRA PARA LA FAMILIA, EL ESPOSO DE ESTELA TRABAJA EN UNA FABRICA Y MUCHAS VECES TIENE QUE SALIR FUERA DE LA CIUDAD.
PARA ESTELA SU ANHELO ES QUE SU HIJA DE 9 AÑOS DE ESTUDIE PARA TENER UNA VIDA MEJOR EN UN FUTURO Y ELLA ESPERA PODER DARLE LA OPORTUNIDAD ES POR ESO QUE SOLICITA EL CREDITO PAR AINVERTIR EN SU NEGOCIO SURTIRLO UN POCO MAS E INCREMENTAR SU NUMERO DE CLIENTES Y DE PRODUCTOS PARA OFRECERLES.
texts.en:
Estela has a daughter who is dependent upon her and her husband.

Estela works in her own store selling groceries and sweets and other items.  It is an extra income for her family.  Estela’s husband works in a factory, and he often has to go outside of the city.

Estela longs for her nine year old daughter to get an education in order to have a better life in the future.  She hopes to be able to give her daughter this opportunity.

That is why she is requesting the loan to invest in her business.  She will use the loan to stock her business a little more, increase the number of customers she has, and increase the products that she offers them.

loans.use: to stock her business.

loans.name: Lobar

texts.ru: Лобархон,сельская женщина 42 лет замужем имеет детей.У нее высшее образование.Уже 18 лет работает в сельской школе,учителем.Очень пунктуальная,трудолюбивая женщина.С 2008 года кредитуется в нашей организации.Раньше занималась живодноводством,но после отъезда супруга в РФ,она прекратила эту деятельность так как здоровье не позволяла.Одной ей очень трудно было выращивать скот.На полученный кредит хочет приобрести строительные материалы для того чтобы достроить дом и женить сына.Заранее благодарит нашу организацию.
texts.en: Lobar is a country woman.  She is married, 42 years old, and has children. She has a higher education.  She has been working in a rural school for eighteen years.  She is a very punctual, hardworking woman.  She has taken loans from our organization since 2008. Earlier, she worked in animal husbandry, but after her husband left for Russia she stopped because of health issues.  It was very difficult to repay the loan on her own. Now, she would like to take out a loan to buy construction materials to finish building a house, and also to marry off her son.  She would like to thank out organization in advance.

loans.use: purchase construction materials

loans.name: Essau

texts.pt:
Casado e ainda não tem filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como professor e quadro do Ministério de Educação, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material (cimento, ferro, pedra, areia, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro pretende melhorar a vida profissionalmente se formando em química, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é de concluir a sua casa e lutar para ingressar no nível superior.
texts.en:
Essau is married and has no children yet, lives in his own house and doesn't support anyone else.

He works as a teacher and is a permanent employee of the Ministry of Education. With this loan he intends to purchase materials (cement, iron, stone, stand and others) in order to continue to build his house.

In future Essau intends to improve his professional life by taking a degree in chemistry and to this end he commits to duly paying off this loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku. 

His challenge is to finish his house and to fight to enrol in higher education.

loans.use: purchase materials (cement, iron, stone, stand and others) in order to continue to build his house.

loans.name: Mary Jean

texts.en:
Mary Jean is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is married and has three children. 

Mary Jean operates a retail shop, or sari-sari store, that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, household goods and beverages.  She has had this business for five years.  She has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy stock including canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Mary Jean has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Mary Jean hopes to improve her business and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy stock including canned goods, soap, shampoo, detergent and beverages.

loans.name: Umedjon

texts.ru: Умедчон человек способен и трудолюбивый, у него на воспитании двое детей, старшему сыну 3 года, младшему 1 год. Семь лет назад его отец купил ему 1 дойную корову, чтобы он начал свой бизнес самостоятельно. В начале Умедчону было очень трудно он потерял корову но он думал об одном как купить новую корову и увеличить поголовье скота. Прошли годы Умедчон достиг своей цели у него сейчас много скота. Умедчон также занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. В основном он выращивает крупный рогатый скот. Уже более 7 лет он занимается этим бизнесом. Его заботливая жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Полученное мясо и молочную продукцию он продает местным жителям по низкой цене. Население данного района приобретают его молочную продукцию. Умедчон также имеет лошадь и он хочет увеличить их поголовье. Умедчон хотел бы получить займ для приобретения скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Umedjon is a capable and hardworking person. He is raising two children, the elder is a three-year-old son and the younger is one-year-old. Seven years ago, his father bought him a dairy cow, so he started his own business. In the beginning it was very difficult Umedjon he lost the cow but he thought about how to buy a new cow and increase his livestock holdings. Years passed and Umedjon reached his goal. He now has very many cattle. Umedjon also works in agriculture. Basically, he raises cattle. For over seven years, he has been in this business. His caring wife helps him. The resulting meat and dairy products he sells to local residents at a low price. The population of the area purchases his dairy products. Umedjon also has a horse and he wants to increase his herd. Umedjon would like to get a loan to purchase livestock in order to expand his business.

loans.use: To buy cattle in order to expand his business

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 33 years old and resides in Sibutad, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines.  She is married and has two children.

To earn a living, Marilyn owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products.  She has been in business for 10 years.  She earns 5,000 PHP each month doing this type of work.  She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP in order to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee. 

In 2011, Marilyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help her improve both her business and her living situation.  In the future, Marilyn wants to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee.

loans.name: Kang

texts.en:
Kang is 43 years old and a loving father of seven children, living in Reussey Keo district, Phnom Penh.  He is a hardworking man who owns a few plots of farmland on which he and his wife cultivate rice crops for daily sustenance.  He has been engaged in this business for ages, earning a suitable income to satisfy his living needs.  However, due to the high cost of commodities and fees for his school-age children, the family struggles to cover these expenses.  

To address this concern, Kang wants to establish a micro-business, raising pigs for both slaughter and offspring to improve his standard of living.  Due to the lack of sufficient capital, Kang is asking for a loan of $1,000 in order to purchase pigs and feed to start up his new business. 

He hopes that this loan will enable him to improve his family’s living conditions as he works hard toward his goal.  He wants to be a successful entrepreneur in the future.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and feed to start up his new business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of bath soap, shampoo, beverages and snacks.

loans.name: Menerma

texts.en:
Menerma is married, 40 years of age, and lives with her 3 kids in Looc, Plaridel in the province of Misamis Occidental. Menerma operates a sari-sari store, or variety store, to earn a living. She has been in this business for more than 6 years, and she earns 15,000 PHP every month. 

Menerma is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase supplementary goods for her general store. She joined GDMPC this year. In the future, Menerma will use her income to support her kids in their studies, until they finish college, and also in their daily needs. Menerma wishes that her business will become more progressive.

loans.use: to purchase supplementary goods for her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of snacks, soft drinks, canned goods, shampoo and bath soap.

loans.name: Poetas Group

texts.es:
Beatriz tiene 29 años de edad y tiene una niña de 11 años la cual estudia la primaria, ella es parte del grupo Poetas y dice que eligieron dicho nombre para el grupo por el lugar donde hacen sus reuniones cada semana. Beatriz comenta que le gustó mucho trabajar  en equipo con las personas de Poetas por que todos son trabajadores y responsables y están a tiempo cuando se les necesita o cuando alguno de ellos no logró juntar su pago, los demás son solidarios y lo apoyan. 

Beatriz tiene una estética haceapenas una semana cambió de establecimiento ya que donde estaba la renta era muy alta y no le quedaba dinero suficiente para seguir surtiendo sus los productos necesarios para su servicio. Dice que esta pidiendo un crédito a Vison Fund (FRAC) para comprar tintes de diferentes colores, una máquina para cortar el pelo, acetona, material para poner uñas de acrílico, líquidos para hacer bases y herramientas como tubos de diferentes tamaños. Beatriz normalmente adquiere sus productos en diferentes tiendas de la ciudad de México donde le dan precios más bajos pues así obtiene más ganancias. Ella está muy contenta porque gracias al crédito tendrá material para hacer sus creaciones con la gente, los servicios que ella ofrece son cortes de pelo, tintes para pelo, elaboración de rayitos, listones, alaciados permanentes, bases, peinados para ocasiones especiales, manicure, pedicura etc. 

Los otros doce integrantes del grupo se llaman Guadalupe, Rodrigo, Irma, Ricarda, Teresa, Eduardo, Elizabeth, Maria Alejandra, Pablo, Janet, Ana Gabriela y María Guadalupe ellos invertirán sus créditos en diferentes actividades económicas como para la compra de zapatos de diferentes marcas y modelos para su venta, para surtir productos de belleza para estética, surtir artículos para refaccionaria, compra de dulces y semillas para su venta, compra y venta de frutas y legumbres de temporada, compra y venta de ropa y calzado de dama y caballero, compra y venta de pollo por kilo, compra y venta de ropa para dama y compra y venta de congelados.
texts.en:
Beatriz, 29, has an 11-year old daughter in primary school.  Beatriz is a member of Poetas (Poets) group and says that they chose the name because of the place they hold their weekly meetings.  She comments that she likes to work as part of a team with the people in Poetas because all are hard-working and responsible and come on time when needed.  They also get together and support other members if he/she is unable to collect the money for the payments.

Beatriz has a beauty shop but only about a week ago she changed to another location since the rent was very high and she didn’t have enough money left to purchase the necessary supplies for her services.  She says that she is requesting a loan from Vision Fund (FRAC) to buy assorted dyes, hair clippers, acetone, material for acrylic nails, liquids for making bases and items such as different size curlers.  Beatriz normally purchases her products in various stores in Mexico City where she pays less and thus earns more.  She is very content because thanks to the loan she will have materials to do her designs for people, haircuts, coloring, highlights, ribbons, permanents, bases, hairdos for special occasions, manicures, pedicures, etc.

The other twelve members are: Guadalupe, Rodrigo, Irma, Ricarda, Teresa, Eduardo, Elizabeth, Maria Alejandra, Pablo, Janet, Ana Gabriela and María Guadalupe .  They use their money in different businesses such as inventory of different brands and styles of shoes, beauty products, replacement parts, purchase and sale of sweets and seeds, purchase and sale of  seasonal fruit and vegetables, purchase and sale of men’s and women’s clothing and shoes, purchase and sale of chicken by the kilo, purchase and sale of women’s clothing, and purchase and sale of frozen food.

loans.use: to buy creams, makeup, nail polish for manicures and pedicures, shampoo, dyes, bleaches, and liquid products used on the hair.

loans.name: Lumiere De Dieu Group

texts.fr: Le groupe LUMIERE DE DIEU est formé de trois  personnes qui appartiennent à une même association d'artisans. Le représentant de ce groupe, nommé Sohè Frédéric est celui dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Sohè Frédéric est marié à une revendeuse du nom de Célestine. Le couple a cinq enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Le couple a un autre enfant à charge en dehors de leurs enfants. Sohè Frédéric vit ensemble avec ses enfants et sa femme. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Sohè Frédéric a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire et a appris la couture. Il y a près de quatorze ans que Sohè Frédéric mène cette activité dans son atelier au Bénin dans le but de contribuer aux divers besoins de sa famille. Dans le but d'acquérir une nouvelle machine à coudre afin d'être plus compétitif sur le marché, Sohè Frédéric désire obtenir un autre crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe LUMIERE DE DIEU. Les deux premiers crédits reçus précédemment ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The LUMIERE DE DIEU group is comprised of three people who belong to the same artisans association. The group representative, Sohè Frédéric, is the one with his hand raised in the photo. This is the third time that the group has asked for financial support from ALIDé in order to grow their business. 

Sohè Frédéric is married to a retailer named Célestine. The couple has five dependent children who all go to school. In addition to their own children, the  couple has another child under their supervision. Sohè Frédéric lives with his wife and children. Together, the couple takes care of the family expenses.

Sohè Frédéric stopped going to school after elementary school and learned how to sew. For close to 14 years, Sohè Frédéric has been sewing in his studio in Benin in order to contribute to the various needs of his family. With the goal of buying a new sewing machine so that he can be more competitive on the market, Sohè Frédéric and the other members of the LUMIERE DE DIEU group would ALIDé to grant them another loan. Their two previous loans were reimbursed.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and sewing supplies.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline, 46 years old, is married and lives in San Roque, Rizal in the Philippines. Evangeline owns and operates a plot of farmland, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for 3 years and earns 7,000 PHP each month. 

Evangeline has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase farm chemicals. She has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, since this year. Evangeline's plan for the future is to save her returns in order to buy another plot of farmland.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

location.town: San Roque, Rizal Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 35 años, soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica, caracterizada por su clima cálido y gente acogedora, ella siempre ha sido una persona muy trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos para superarse y salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar la cerrera de Enfermería que tanto quería, pero desea poder hacerlo algún día; Ana es muy religiosa, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura, especialmente lee la Biblia y en algunas ocasiones cuando visita a sus padres, cocina unos riquísimos “Tallarines Rojos” para engreírlos.
Gracias a su gran deseo de superación y al apoyo de su madre, Ana puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de artículos de ferretería, ella dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 10 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender a un promedio de 45 clientes, Ana cree que su negocio marcha bien debido a los buenos precios y al trato amable y respetuoso que ofrece a sus clientes.
Ana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como fierros, clavos, pernos, abrazaderas, selladores, tubos, alambres y otros artículos de ferretería en general; de esta manera Ana tendrá mejor abastecido su negocio y podrá incrementar sus ventas e ingresos económicos, con los cuales poco a poco desea poder cumplir su gran sueño de poder estudiar la carrera de Enfermería y contar con una ferretería mas grande, que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda tener sucursales en diferentes partes de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Ana is a single 35-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Ica, which is characterized by its hot climate and welcoming people. She has always been a very hardworking and enthusiastic woman who dedicates all her efforts to bettering herself and coming out ahead. Unfortunately, owing to a lack of financial resources she was not able to study to be a nurse, as she wanted so much. But she wants to do it one day. Ana is very religious, and in her free moments she likes to dedicate a little time to reading, especially reading the Bible. Sometimes when she visits her parents she cooks some very delicious "Tallarines Rojos," (homestyle Peruvian spaghetti in red sauce) to pamper them. 

Thanks to her great desire to overcome, and thanks to the support of her mother, Ana began her small business selling hardware items. She works at her business approximately ten hours each day, and can wait on an average of 45 customers each day. Ana believes that her business is going well owing to the good prices and the friendly, respectful treatment she offers her customers.

Ana is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the offered help she'll be able to buy merchandise such as knives, nails, bolts, brackets, sealant, pipes, wire, and other general hardware items. In this way Ana will have her business better supplied, and she'll be able to increase her sales and financial income. With this increase, little by little, she wants to be able to accomplish her great dream of being able to study nursing and having a bigger hardware store; and in a not-too-distant future being able to have branches of her store in different parts of the city.

loans.use: to buy general hardware items to sell.

loans.name: Cristy Jean

texts.en:
Cristy Jean is 21 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child. Cristy Jean has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for three years.

Cristy Jean has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Cristy Jean hopes to improve her business for the education of her child.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, soap, shampoo and beverages.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 30 years old and has 2 children. She lives in Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. 

Geraldine owns and operates a business venture, selling a variety of clothing products to earn a living. She has been in this business for 2 years. Each month, she earns 15,000 PHP doing this type of business. Geraldine has requested a loan of 25,000 PHP to purchase new items to expand product offering. 

Recently, Geraldine joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Geraldine is a positive person and simply hopes for business improvements.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offering.

loans.name: May Flor

texts.en:
May Flor is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. 

May Flor is providing motorela or motorcycle services, with her husband as the driver. She has had this business for 5 years. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the services.

May Flor has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, she hopes to improve her services for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy tools for her motorcycle and to pay for gasoline.

loans.name: Portia

texts.en: Portia is from Magsaysay, Baliangao, Misamis Occidental. She is 57 years old, married, and has 2 children. Portia owns and operates a banana plantation business. She has been in this business for 9 years and wants to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. Portia plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. Rosalina has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. 

Rosalina has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy stocks of snacks, bath soap, shampoo and beverages. Rosalina has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of snacks, bath soap, shampoo and beverages.

loans.name: Vidjannagni Klistin

texts.fr: Vidjannagni Klistin est âgé de 29 ans et est marié à une couturière du nom de Julienne. Vidjannagni Klistin a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire. Le couple a trois enfants, dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a deux autres enfants à charge. Vidjannagni Klistin vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Depuis cinq ans, Vidjannagni Klistin mène comme activité la vente de gaz oil et de l'huile à moteur par le système de distribution. Par contre Vidjannagni Klistin achète ses produits au Nigeria. C’est la première fois que Vidjannagni Klistin sollicite auprès de ALIDé un crédit, crédit qui lui servira à élever le niveau de son activité et à mieux satisfaire sa clientèle.
texts.en:
Vidjannagni Klistin is 29 years old and married to a seamstress named Julienne.  He left school at the primary level.  

Vidjannagni Klistin and Julienne have three children, some of whom go to school and all their dependents.  Besides their own children, they have two other children in their care.

Vidjannagni Klistin lives with his wife and children.  The couple jointly takes care of the various household expenses.

Vidjannagni Klistin has been selling fuel oil and motor oil through the distribution system, for the past five years.  He buys his goods in Nigeria.

This is his first loan from ALIDé.  He will use this loan to increase the level of his activity and to better satisfy the needs of his customers.

loans.use: to buy containers of motor oil and fuel oil.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos menores, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como assistente técnico na Direcção Distrital de Educação, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar bens de consumo (mesa, cadeiras, estante de sala, e outros) para mobilar a sua casa.
No futuro pretende aumentar o nível de escolarização na área dos recursos humanos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é de construir a sua casa com material convencional.
texts.en:
She's married and has two underage children. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She works as a technical assistant for the District Directorate of Education. With the current loan she intends to purchase consumer goods (a table, chairs, a living room shelf, etc.) in order to furnish her home.
In the future she plans to upgrade her education level in the field of human resources. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
Her challenge is to build her home with conventional materials.

loans.use: to purchase consumer goods (a table, chairs, a living room shelf, etc.) in order to furnish her home.

loans.name: So

texts.en:
So, age 44, is a business-minded woman who is eager to be a successful entrepreneur and attain a standard of living in her daily life. She is in three businesses: rice husbandry, hog raising and a bamboo basket making business. For the rice, she and her husband usually cultivate it once a year, primarily growing in the rainy season. The other two businesses have been operating from day to day. It’s such busy work for her, however the work is very agreeable to her. From her hard work, she is able to make at least 5 USD per day.

Recently So has hired a few construction workers to renovate her house, but she doesn’t have enough capital to finish this construction. Consequently, she would like to take out a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase building materials used in construction. She feels very happy and grateful for the constant support from our lenders. This will be the fourth loan to help her family. She has been an honest client with HKL for a long time.

loans.use: to purchase building materials used in construction

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of snacks, detergents, fabric softener, shampoo, beverages and rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy canned goods, soap, shampoo, and beverages

loans.name: Belmiro

texts.pt:
Solteiro e pai de 1 filho que frequenta a escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como assistente comunitário, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material (cimento, areia, pedra, ferro, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro pretende melhorar a sua vida profissionalmente na área de desenvolvimento comunitário, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é de concluir a sua casa e mobilar para melhor confortar a sua familia.
texts.en:
He's single and has a son who attends school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and does not support anyone else.
He works as an outreach worker. With the current loan he intends to purchase supplies (cement, sand, rocks, iron, etc.) in order to continue building his home.
In the future he plans to improve his professional life in the field of community development. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is to finish building and furnishing his house so that his family can be more comfortable.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, rocks, iron, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Jenalyn

texts.en:
Jenalyn is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. Jenalyn has a food/retail shop or sari-sari (convenience) store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for 5 years.

She requested a loan for 15,000 PHP to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages. Jenalyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Jenalyn hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, soap, shampoo, detergents and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Galbadrakh

texts.en:
Galbadrakh is a 40-year-old married man who lives with his wife and son. He works as a mechanism presser at a local company. 

The family lived in a ger, a traditional felt tent, in his relative's yard. It was very hard to live in someone else's yard. With his and his wife's hardwork, they bought a small yard for their family. 

According to the summer season, Galbadrakh will build a small house for his family in order to improve the living conditions for his spouse and son. Thus, he is requesting a 1,500,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to buy essential building materials.

loans.use: To buy essential construction materials and to build a small house for his family

loans.name: Catarina

texts.pt:
Casada mãe de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta uma neta que vive com ela.
É docente e quadro do Ministério do Interior, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (janelas, cimento, portas, areia e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro pretende comprar gado para a criação como forma de investir no seu futuro, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é de poder pagar o empréstimo sem nenhum problema.
texts.en:
She's married and has four children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports a granddaughter who lives with her.
She's a teacher and a staffer of the Ministry of the Interior. With the current loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (window frames, cement, doors, sand, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
